channel.title: Monsters don't fight back to range?
channel.description:
Yeah.. For some reason, NPC's have... Trouble, responding properly to range attacks. They do fight back to mage, however. Normally I wouldn't care, but I have dark beasts, and rangers are just raping. The dark beasts have decents drops, and I don't want the rangers to be the richest. I already altered range pking, so that discourages rangers, but then I have this dilemma. Normally, I'd go through and read everything, but as of now it's late, I have to go soon, and I'm working on other things that are of more importance. Any help?
Thanks.

item.title: Monsters don't fight back to range?
